var.name: interview__id
var.labl: Unique 32-character long identifier of the interview

var.name: sssys_irnd
var.labl: Random number in the range 0..1 associated with interview

qstn.qstnLit: ID1. Camp Name
ID2. Section Code / Number
ID3. Zone Code / Number
ID4. Block Code / Number
ID6. Cluster Number
ID8. Household Number
ID5. Survey Date
ID6: Country

South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands

qstn.qstnLit: DM0: Is the IYCF module being included?
DM1. Was consent given for conducting the interview?
qstn.ivuInstr: ENSURE THAT YOU HAVE INTRODUCED THE TEAM AND INFORMED THEM ABOUT THE INTERVIEW.

DM2. What is the sex of the household head?
qstn.ivuInstr: THE HOUSEHOLD HEAD IS THE PERSON RESPONSIBLE FOR MAKING THE DECISIONS FOR THE HOUSEHOLD AS A WHOLE. USE THE TERM AGREED UPON DURING THE TRAINING.

qstn.qstnLit: DM3. What is the age of the household head (years)?
qstn.ivuInstr: YOU DO NOT NEED TO SEE PROOF OF AGE.

qstn.qstnLit: DM4. What is the country of origin of the household head? (OPTIONAL)

catgry.labl: Congo, the Democratic Republic of the
South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands

qstn.qstnLit: DM13. Did all household members arrive to %CAMPNAME%/%COUNTRY% at the same time?
DM14. When did the household arrive to %CAMPNAME%/%COUNTRY%?
HHMEMBERS.Count(x=>x.HHMAGE <= 4)
HHMEMBERS.Count(x=>(x.HHMAGE >= 15 && x.HHMAGE <= 49) && (x.HHMSEX == 2))
HHMEMBERS.Count(x=>(x.HHMAGE >= 15 && x.HHMAGE <= 49) && (x.HHMSEX == 2) && x.HHMPREG == 1)
HHMEMBERS.Count(x=>!x.HHMAGE.InRange(0,990))
HHMEMBERS.Count(x=>!x.HHMSEX.InRange(1,2))
HHMEMBERS.Count(x=>x.HHMAGE <= 1 && x.HHMSEX == 2)
HHMEMBERS.Count(x=>x.HHMAGE <= 1 && x.HHMSEX == 1)
TOTFU2 + TOTMU2
HHMEMBERS.Count(x=>x.HHMAGE <= 4 && x.HHMSEX == 2)
HHMEMBERS.Count(x=>x.HHMAGE <= 4 && x.HHMSEX == 1)
TOTFU5 + TOTMU5
HHMEMBERS.Count(x=>x.HHMAGE >= 5 && x.HHMAGE <= 14 && x.HHMSEX == 2)
HHMEMBERS.Count(x=>x.HHMAGE >= 5 && x.HHMAGE <= 14 && x.HHMSEX == 1)
TOTF514 + TOTM514
HHMEMBERS.Count(x=>x.HHMAGE <= 14 && x.HHMSEX == 2)
HHMEMBERS.Count(x=>x.HHMAGE <= 14 && x.HHMSEX == 1)
TOTFU15 + TOTMU15
HHMEMBERS.Count(x=>x.HHMAGE >= 15 && x.HHMAGE <= 64 && x.HHMSEX == 2)
HHMEMBERS.Count(x=>x.HHMAGE >= 15 && x.HHMAGE <= 64 && x.HHMSEX == 1)
TOTF1564 + TOTM1564
HHMEMBERS.Count(x=>x.HHMAGE >= 65 && x.HHMSEX == 2)
HHMEMBERS.Count(x=>x.HHMAGE >= 65 && x.HHMSEX == 1)
TOTF65OLD + TOTM65OLD
HHMEMBERS.Count(x=>x.HHMAGE >= 0 && x.HHMSEX == 2)
HHMEMBERS.Count(x=>x.HHMAGE >= 0 && x.HHMSEX == 1)

qstn.qstnLit: FS10. Which of your household’s basic needs can you not meet?
FS10. Which of your household’s basic needs can you not meet?
FS10. Which of your household’s basic needs can you not meet?
FS11. What cooking fuel does your household usually use?
FS12. Does your household receive cooking fuel assistance?
FS13. How many days did the fuel from the [INSERT] cycle of [INSERT LAST CYCLE MONTH] last?
FS14. In the past 4 weeks, have you or anyone in your household needed to stop a child from attending school?

FS15. In the past 4 weeks, have you or anyone in your household needed to sell any assets that would not have normally been sold in order to buy food or basic goods (e .g . sold items such as a car, motorbike, plough, sewing machine, tools, seed stock, livestock, productive land)?
FS16. In the past 4 weeks, have you or anyone in your household needed to ask for money from strangers (begging)?
FS17. In the past 4 weeks, have you or anyone in your household needed to move to a poorer quality shelter?
FS18. In the past 4 weeks, have you or anyone in your household needed to send household members under the age of 16 to work?
FS19. In the past 4 weeks, have you or anyone in your household needed to send a member of the household to work far away?

FS20. In the past 4 weeks, have you or anyone in your household needed to engage in activities for money or items that you feel puts you or other members of your household at risk of harm (e .g . illegal activities like hunting, fishing, survival sex, drug dealing, early marriage, joining armed groups, etc .)?
FS21. In the past 4 weeks, have you or anyone in your household needed to skip paying rent / debt repayments to meet other needs?
FS22. In the past 4 weeks, have you or anyone in your household needed to take out new loans or borrowed money?
FS23. In the past 4 weeks, have you or anyone in your household needed to reduce expenditure on hygiene items, water, baby items, health or education in order to meet household food needs?
FS24. In the past 7 days, how many times did your household rely on less preferred and/or less expensive food due to lack of food or money to buy food?
FS25. In the past 7 days, how many times did your household borrow food or rely on help from a friend or relative due to lack of food or money to buy food?
FS26. In the past 7 days, how many times did your household reduce the number of meals eaten in a day due to lack of food or money to buy food?
FS27. In the past 7 days, how many times did your household limit portion sizes at mealtime due to lack of food or money to buy food?
FS28. In the past 7 days, how many times did your household reduce consumption by adults so children could eat, due to lack of food or money to buy food?

FS29.1. In the past 7 days, how many days did your household eat any [INSERT CEREALS LOCALLY AVAILABLE] or any foods made from these such as [INSERT LOCAL FOODS). Or any [INSERT WHITE ROOTS AND TUBERS LOCALLY AVAILABLE] or any foods made from roots such as [INSERT LOCAL FOODS]. Or any [INSERT OTHER STARCHY FOODS LOCALLY AVAILABLE]
qstn.ivuInstr: READ THE LIST OF FOODS AND DO NOT PROBE. ONLY RECORD THE CONSUMPTION OF SIGNIFICANT QUANTITIES OF FOOD BY THE HOUSEHOLD . WRITE ‘0’ IF NOT CONSUMED IN THE LAST 7 DAYS

qstn.qstnLit: FS29.2. In the past 7 days, how many days did your household eat any [INSERT LEGUMES, NUTS AND SEEDS LOCALLY AVAILABLE] or any foods made from these such as [INSERT LOCAL FOODS]
FS29.3. In the past 7 days, how many days did your household eat any [INSERT MILK AND MILK PRODUCTS LOCALLY AVAILABLE]
FS29.4. In the past 7 days, how many days did your household eat any milk, fish or eggs?
FS29.4.1. In the past 7 days, how many days did your household eat any [INSERT FLESH MEAT LOCALLY AVAILABLE]
FS29.4.2. In the past 7 days, how many days did your household eat any [INSERT ORGAN MEAT OR BLOOD-BASED FOODS LOCALLY AVAILABLE] (
FS29.4.3. In the past 7 days, how many days did your household eat any [INSERT FRESH, DRIED OR CANNED FISH OR SHELLFISH LOCALLY AVAILABLE]
FS29.4.4. In the past 7 days, how many days did your household eat any eggs from [INSERT EGGS LOCALLY AVAILABLE]
FS29.5. In the past 7 days, how many days did your household eat any [INSERT ANY VEGETABLES AND LEAVES LOCALLY AVAILABLE]
FS29.5.1. In the past 7 days, how many days did your household eat any [INSERT VITAMIN A RICH VEGETABLES AND TUBERS LOCALLY AVAILABLE]
FS29.5.2. In the past 7 days, how many days did your household eat any [INSERT DARK GREEN LEAFY VEGETABLES LOCALLY AVAILABLE INLCUDING WILD FORMS AND VITAMIN A RICH LEAVES]
FS29.6. In the past 7 days, how many days did your household eat any [INSERT ANY FRUITS LOCALLY AVAILABLE INCLUDING WILD FRUITS], and 100% fruit juice made from these
FS29.6.1. In the past 7 days, how many days did your household eat any [INSERT VITAMIN A RICH FRUITS LOCALLY AVAILABLE], and 100% fruit juice made from these
FS29.7. In the past 7 days, how many days did your household eat any [INSERT OILS AND FATS LOCALLY AVAILABLE] added to food or used for cooking
FS29.8. In the past 7 days, how many days did your household eat any [INSERT SWEETS, SWEETENED SODA OR JUICE DRINKS AND SUGARY FOODS LOCALLY AVAILABLE]
FS29.9. In the past 7 days, how many days did your household eat any [INSERT SPICES, CONDIMENTS AND BEVERAGES LOCALLY AVAILABLE]
FS29.10. In the past 7 days, how many days did your household eat any [INSERT SPECIALIZED NUTRITIOUS FOODS AVAILABLE]

TN6. Did you have your house sprayed with insecticide in an indoor residual spray campaign in the past 6/12 months?
TN7. Do you have mosquito bed nets in this household that can be used while sleeping?
TN8. How many of these mosquito bed nets that can be used while sleeping does your household have?
HHMEMBERS.Count(x=>x.SLPNET == 1)
HHMEMBERS.Count(x=>x.SLPNET == 1 && x.HHMAGE < 5)
HHMEMBERS.Count(x=>x.SLPNET == 1 && x.HHMPREG == 1)
HHMEMBERS.Count(x=>x.SLPBRAND1.InRange(1,94))
HHMEMBERS.Count(x=>x.HHMAGE < 5 && x.SLPBRAND1.InRange(1,94))
HHMEMBERS.Count(x=>x.HHMPREG == 1 && x.SLPBRAND1.InRange(1,94))
WS3. What is the principal source of drinking water for members of your household?
qstn.ivuInstr: SELECT ONE BUT DO NOT PROMPT WITH RESPONSES CONSIDER DRINKING WATER ONLY

catgry.labl: Piped connection to house (or neighbour’s house)

qstn.qstnLit: WS4. Where do you and your household members (excluding children under 5) usually go to defecate?
qstn.ivuInstr: SELECT ONE BUT DO NOT PROMPT WITH RESPONSES

qstn.qstnLit: WS5. Please show me the soap you have in the household
WS6. How many containers do you have to collect or store water for domestic purposes for your house? Please show me all of them one by one
qstn.ivuInstr: RECORD ONE BY ONE CHECK FOR ALL OF THE CONTAINERS DO NOT INCLUDE BROKEN, LEAKING, OR NON-FUNCTIONAL CONTAINERS

qstn.qstnLit: TN9. Can the bed net be observed?
TN10. What is the brand of the net observed?
TN11: Please specify brand of bed net

var.name: interview__id
var.labl: Unique 32-character long identifier of the interview

qstn.qstnLit: WS7. What is the type of container?
WS8. What is the volume of the container (Liters)?
qstn.ivuInstr: ENTER THE AMOUNT OF LITRES THIS CONTAINER CAN HOLD

qstn.qstnLit: WS9. Is the container covered?
WS10. Number of journeys made with container for the collection of water for domestic purposes yesterday?
qstn.ivuInstr: RECORD ‘NONE’ IF HOUSEHOLD DID NOT FILL IT YESTERDAY

var.name: interview__id
var.labl: Unique 32-character long identifier of the interview

qstn.qstnLit: CH5. Do you have an official age documentation for %CHILD%?
CH6. What is %CHILD%’s date of birth (Day/Month/Year)
CH7. What is the age of %CHILD% in months?
qstn.ivuInstr: SINCE NO AGE DOCUMENTATION IS AVAILABLE, ESTIMATE AGE USING A LOCAL EVENTS CALENDAR

qstn.qstnLit: MONTHS != null ? MONTHS : ((new DateTime(SURVDAT.Value.Date.Year, BIRTHDAT.Value.Month, BIRTHDAT.Value.Day)) <= (new DateTime(SURVDAT.Value.Date.Year, SURVDAT.Value.Month, SURVDAT.Value.Day)) ? ((SURVDAT.Value.Date.Year * 12 + SURVDAT.Value.Date.Month)-(BIRTHDAT.Value.Year * 12 + BIRTHDAT.Value.Month)) : ((SURVDAT.Value.Date.Year * 12 + SURVDAT.Value.Date.Month)-(BIRTHDAT.Value.Year * 12 + (BIRTHDAT.Value.Month+1))))
MONTHSX.InRange(CHLOWRANGE, 59)
CH2. Was consent given for conducting the interview and the measurements?
qstn.ivuInstr:
Ensure that you have introduced the team and informed them about the interview and the measurements
If answer is '2' (No), stop here for the child questionnaire

qstn.qstnLit: CH8. Does %CHILD% arrive to %CAMPNAME% before or after [INSERT THE EVENT RESPONSIBLE FOR THE INFLUX OF REFUGEES]?
CH9. Is %CHILD% currently present in the household?
CH10. %CHILD%’s weight in kilograms (±0.1kg)
CH11. Was %CHILD% dressed with clothes for the weight measurement?
CH12. %CHILD%’s length/height in cm (±0.1cm)
HEIGHT <= 45 ? 45 : HEIGHT > 120 ? 120 : HEIGHT
CH13. Was %CHILD% measured lying down or standing up?
CH14. Clinical examination: Does %CHILD% present bilateral pitting oedema?
CH15A. %CHILD%’s middle upper arm circumference (MUAC) in mm (±1mm) or cm (±0.1cm)
CH15B. Unit of measurement for CH15A:
MUACUNIT == 1 ? MUAC * 10 : MUAC
CH16A. Is %CHILD% currently being treated in for malnutrition in any nutrition programme?
CH16B. Which nutrition programme is %CHILD% currently being treated in for malnutrition?
CH16B. Which nutrition programme is %CHILD% currently being treated in for malnutrition?
CH16B. Which nutrition programme is %CHILD% currently being treated in for malnutrition?
CH17. Is %CHILD% currently enrolled in the BSFP?
CH18. Has %CHILD% been vaccinated against measles?
CH19. Has %CHILD% received a vitamin A capsule in the past 6 months?
CH20. Was %CHILD% given any drug for intestinal worms in the last six months?
CH21. Has %CHILD% had diarrhoea in the past 2 weeks?
CH22. Did you give [INSERT LOCAL NAME FOR WHO ORS] to %rostertitle% when s/he had diarrhoea?
CH23. Did you give zinc tablets or syrup to %CHILD% when s/he had diarrhoea?
